prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Piano, Pipe, Guitar, Bass, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Piano, Pipe, Guitar, and Bass, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Piano, Pipe, Guitar, and Bass, excluding Brass.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Drums, Piano, Pipe, Guitar, Bass, but not Brass.
